entry.name: unload
entry.title: .unload()
entry.desc: Bind an event handler to the "unload" event, or trigger that event on an element.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

argument.name: eventData
argument.desc: An object containing data that will be passed to the event handler.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

div.p: This API has been removed in jQuery 3.0.
Instead of .unload( handler ) or .unload( eventData, handler ), use .on( "unload", handler ) or .on( "unload", eventData, handler ), respectively.
